appDescription: Zareshop Vendor App helps Ethiopian vendors manage their online business efficiently.

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Login to manage your shop and grow your business.

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your phone number to receive reset instructions
forgotPassword.descriptionText: Don't worry! Enter your phone number and we'll send you a verification code to reset your password.
forgotPassword.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

verifyOtp.title: Verify OTP
verifyOtp.subtitle: Enter the code sent to {phoneNumber}
verifyOtp.descriptionText: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to your phone number. Enter it below to reset your password.
verifyOtp.passwordError: Password must be at least 6 characters

welcome.title: Welcome to ZareShop Vendor!
welcome.subtitle: Let's set up your shop in a few simple steps.
welcome.description: You'll personalize your business profile, add your first products, and link payment options.

phoneNumber.title: Phone Number
phoneNumber.subtitle: Enter your phone number to get started
phoneNumber.phoneError: Please enter a valid phone number
phoneNumber.infoText: We'll send a 6-digit OTP for verification.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.subtitle: Tell us about your business
basicInfo.descriptionHint: Describe your business, products, and services...
basicInfo.helperDescription: A good description helps customers understand what you offer and builds trust.

documents.kycSubtitle: Upload the required documents for Know Your Customer (KYC) verification.
documents.businessLicenseDesc: Upload your official business registration or license document for KYC verification
documents.coverImageDesc: Upload a cover image that represents your business for KYC verification
documents.guidelinesBullets:
• Images should be clear and readable for verification
• Accepted formats: JPG, PNG
• Maximum file size: 5MB per image
• Documents must be valid and unexpired

shippingAddress.title: Shipping Address
shippingAddress.subtitle: Where should we deliver orders?
shippingAddress.tapToSelectOnMap: Tap to select location on map

subscription.choosePlanSubtitle: Select a subscription plan to get started
subscription.checkInternet: Please check your internet connection and try again
subscription.benefitsBullets:
• You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime
• All plans include customer support
• Payment is processed securely
• Cancel anytime with no hidden fees

payout.title: Payout Information
payout.subtitle: How would you like to receive payments?
payout.confirmDetails: I confirm these details are correct
payout.authorizePayout: I authorize ZareShop to process payouts
payout.secureDesc: Your payment information is encrypted and securely stored. We never share your financial details with third parties.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.agreeLine: By subscribing to our service, you agree to the following terms:

section1.title: 1. Subscription Plans
section1.content:
• You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time
• Changes take effect at the next billing cycle
• Prorated charges may apply for upgrades

section2.title: 2. Payment Terms
section2.content:
• All payments are processed securely
• Billing occurs automatically on your subscription date
• Failed payments may result in service suspension

section3.title: 3. Cancellation Policy
section3.content:
• You can cancel your subscription at any time
• No cancellation fees apply
• Access continues until the end of your billing period

section4.title: 4. Service Availability
section4.content:
• We strive for 99.9% uptime
• Scheduled maintenance will be announced in advance
• We are not liable for temporary service interruptions

section5.title: 5. Data and Privacy
section5.content:
• Your data is protected according to our Privacy Policy
• We do not sell your personal information
• You retain ownership of your business data

terms.footer: By checking the agreement box, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms and conditions.

success.title: Welcome to ZareShop!
success.subtitle: Your account has been created successfully
success.description: You can now start managing your business and adding products.

vendorSubmitted.title: Application Submitted!
vendorSubmitted.reviewMessage: Your application is now under review by our admin team. This process typically takes 24-48 hours. You will receive an email notification once it's approved.

adminApproval.reviewIntro: Review your information and submit your application for admin approval.
adminApproval.awaitingDesc: Your application will be reviewed by our admin team within 24-48 hours. You'll receive a notification once approved.
adminApproval.timelineSubmittedDesc: Your vendor application has been submitted successfully
adminApproval.timelineReviewDesc: Our team will review your documents and business information
adminApproval.timelineNotifyDesc: You'll receive an email and app notification when approved
adminApproval.timelineStartDesc: Begin adding products and managing your store

userExists.title: Account Already Exists
userExists.banner: User already exists. Please try to login.

submissionFailed.title: Submission Failed
submissionFailed.hint: Please check your information and try again. If the problem persists, contact our support team.

businessNameConflict.title: Business Name Conflict
businessNameConflict.headerDesc: The business name you entered is already taken by another vendor.
businessNameConflict.conflictDesc: The business name '{originalName}' is already registered. Please choose a different name for your business.
businessNameConflict.nameTooShort: Business name must be at least 3 characters
businessNameConflict.nameHelp: Choose a unique name that represents your business

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.addDesc: Add a new payment method to receive payouts.
paymentMethods.useRegistrationPhoneDesc: Use the same phone number from your registration
paymentMethods.cbeBirrDesc: Commercial Bank of Ethiopia mobile banking

help.title: Contact Support
help.subtitle: Need help? We're here to assist you!
help.notifyByPhone: You will be notified by phone number
help.responseSla: We will respond within 4 hours. Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM EAT

contacts.title: Contact Information
contacts.noPhoneNumbers: No phone numbers added yet. Click "Add Phone" to add one.
contacts.deleteContactMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all contact information? This action cannot be undone.
contacts.addContactInfo: Add your contact information to get started

auth.title: Authentication
auth.twoFactorAuthDesc: Add extra security to your account

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.validationError: Please check your input and try again.
errors.userExists: User already exists. Please login instead.
errors.otpExpired: Verification code expired. Please request a new code.
errors.phoneInUse: This phone number is already in use.
errors.userNotFound: User not found with this phone number.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.websiteInvalid: Please enter a valid website URL (e.g., https://example.com)
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid Ethiopian phone number (9 digits starting with 9)
validation.password: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {max} characters

themes.themeDescription: Select a theme that matches your business

paymentProcessing.title: Payment Processing
paymentProcessing.content: Zareshop will process your payouts according to the selected payment method. Payouts are typically processed within 2-5 business days.

feesAndCharges.title: Fees and Charges
feesAndCharges.content: A standard processing fee of 2.5% applies to all transactions. Additional fees may apply based on your payment method.

verification.title: Verification
verification.content: Payment details must be verified before payouts can be processed. Please ensure all information is accurate.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataProtection: We respect your privacy and protect your data:
points: Your personal information is encrypted and stored securely
We only collect data necessary for service delivery
We never sell or share your data with third parties
You can request data deletion at any time

otp.title: Verify Phone
otp.subtitle: Enter the verification code sent to your phone
otp.didntReceive: Didn't receive the code? Check your SMS messages. A resend button will appear after 60 seconds.

search.title: Search Products
search.hint: Enter product name, description, or vendor...
